965130.name: History Table: Lore & Quiz
965130.description:
Take a trip through time and learn more about the main events and people of world history with the History Table: Lore & Quiz!

Second World War, the discovery of America, the first manned flight into space... This interactive guide contains only the main dates and events that will allow you to trace the world history from its inception to our days without becoming entangled in endless numbers and names.

Features:

  • All information about the main events of world history
  • Track events by country, theme and time period
    [*Russia, China and USA are available[/list]
965130.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 简体中文
